name: Cardventure (Bengad)
description:
this game is a demo made for the metroidvenia month game jam. This is an unfinished demo, and I will make this a full game in the future, but this is what I managed to make in the month I had.

Another thing is that there are no "saves" for the game, the save spots are for respawning and healing, but the game is short anyway so it doesn't really matter.
